body:
Sorry racist people, black people aren't the only guys who cuck other guys.  This is just what the artists and the people who buy this like.  Also, black people aren't the only ones with big dicks...so if that's why you're racist...sorry, you're just unlucky.

Also, the pictures can't see you being racist, so you just seem triggered and dumb for no reason.  You can blacklist NTR by the way, any tag can be.  It will stop you from clicking on something and making a fool of yourself.  You've probably been told that before, but still do it anyway.
Couldve been good without the "black owned", queen of spades etc. Just the Tomgirl wouldve been good
the penis is just really small. The chastity cage in this manga actually exists. https://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/324202251019?mkevt=1&mkcid=1&mkrid=710-53481-19255-0&campid=5338722076&toolid=10001
Please tell me the penis was just really really small
